long_description: The Victorinox Automatic Umbrella is conveniently compact for easy travel use, and offers dependable, on-demand protection from the elements. 3-stage automatic umbrella opens and closes with the touch of a button. Titanium-enhanced alloy frame with injection molded plastic and fiberglass form a strong and lightweight umbrella that stands up to high winds. Polyester fabric with water-repellent treatment and polyurethane inner coating offers increased protection from the elements. Molded handle fits comfortably in the hand. Includes a carrying case for convenient storage.
short_description: The Victorinox Automatic Umbrella is conveniently compact for easy travel use, and offers dependable, on-demand protection from the elements.
